```{python}
import time
import pandas as pd
from zipfile import ZipFile
start = time.time()
with ZipFile("dados/flights.csv.zip", 'r') as zip_file:
    # LÃª o arquivo flights.csv
    with zip_file.open("flights.csv") as file:
        flights = pd.read_csv(file, header=0, sep=",", low_memory=False)
end = time.time()
end - start
```
